verses.verse: "Come <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon;<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> on the <S%H776>ground<s%> without a <S%H3678>throne,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans:<s%> for you shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H7390>tender<s%> and <S%H6028>delicate.<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H7347>millstones,<s%> and <S%H2912>grind<s%> <S%H7058>meal;<s%> <S%H1540>remove<s%> your <S%H6777>veil,<s%> <S%H2834>strip<s%> off the <S%H7640>train,<s%> <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H7785>leg,<s%> pass <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers.<s%>

Your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> <S%H2781>yes,<s%> your shame shall be <S%H7200>seen:<s%> I will <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> and will <S%H6293>spare<s%> no <S%H120>man.<s%>"
Our <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3427>"Sit<s%> in <S%H1748>silence,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> into <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> for you shall no <S%H3254>more<s%> be <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H1404>mistress<s%> of <S%H4467>kingdoms.<s%>

I was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with my <S%H5971>people,<s%> I <S%H2490>profaned<s%> my <S%H5159>inheritance,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into your <S%H3027>hand:<s%> you <S%H7760>showed<s%> them no <S%H7356>mercy;<s%> on the <S%H2205>aged<s%> you have <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3513>heavily<s%> laid your <S%H5923>yoke.<s%>

You <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H1404><s%> 'I shall be a mistress <S%H5769>forever;<s%>' so that you did not <S%H7760>lay<s%> these things to your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> nor did you <S%H2142>remember<s%> the latter end of <S%H319>it.<s%>

"Now therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H5719>this,<s%> you who are given to pleasures, who <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> who <S%H559>say<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> <S%H657><s%> 'I am, and there is none else besides <S%H3427>me;<s%> I shall not sit as a <S%H490>widow,<s%> neither shall I <S%H3045>know<s%> the loss of <S%H7908>children:<s%>'

but these <S%H8147>two<s%> things shall <S%H935>come<s%> to you in a <S%H7281>moment<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> the loss of <S%H7908>children,<s%> and <S%H489>widowhood;<s%> in their full <S%H8537>measure<s%> shall they <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H7230>you,<s%> in the multitude of your <S%H3785>sorceries,<s%> and the <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6109>abundance<s%> of your <S%H2267>enchantments.<s%>

For you have <S%H982>trusted<s%> in your <S%H7451>wickedness;<s%> you have <S%H559>said,<s%> No one <S%H7200>sees<s%> <S%H2451>me;<s%> your wisdom and your <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> it has <S%H7725>perverted<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> and you have said in your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> I <S%H657>am,<s%> and there is none else besides me.

Therefore <S%H7451>evil<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> on <S%H3045>you;<s%> you won't know when it <S%H7837>dawns:<s%> and <S%H1943>mischief<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%> on <S%H3201>you;<s%> you will not be able to put it <S%H3722>away:<s%> and <S%H7722>desolation<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you <S%H6597>suddenly,<s%> which you <S%H3045>don't<s%> know.

<S%H5975>"Stand<s%> now with your <S%H2267>enchantments,<s%> and with the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H3785>sorceries,<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> you have <S%H3021>labored<s%> from your <S%H5271>youth;<s%> if so be you shall be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3276>profit,<s%> if so be you may <S%H6206>prevail.<s%>

You are <S%H3811>wearied<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of your <S%H6098>counsels:<s%> let now the <S%H1895>astrologers,<s%> the <S%H2374>stargazers,<s%> the <S%H2320>monthly<s%> <S%H3045>prognosticators,<s%> stand <S%H5975>up,<s%> and <S%H3467>save<s%> you from the things that shall come on <S%H935>you.<s%>

<S%H7179>Behold,<s%> they shall be as stubble; the <S%H784>fire<s%> shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H5337>them;<s%> they shall not deliver <S%H5315>themselves<s%> from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H3852>flame:<s%> it shall not be a <S%H1513>coal<s%> to <S%H2552>warm<s%> <S%H217>at,<s%> nor a fire to sit <S%H3427>before.<s%>

Thus shall the things be to you in which you have <S%H3021>labored:<s%> those who have <S%H5503>trafficked<s%> with you from your <S%H5271>youth<s%> shall <S%H8582>wander<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> to his <S%H5676>quarter;<s%> there shall be none to save <S%H3467>you.<s%>
